After carefully checked the code, I found `* !value.equals(method.getDefaultValue())` works fine.

We should only make sure that the default values in Service and Reference are the same as the ones used inside the workflow. 
That explains why `register` fails to work: the default value in Service is `false` while the actual default value used in the registering process is `true`.
But this value has been changed to `true` in the latest version.
I believe we should visit this issue as early as possible.

> > 1. write a project that is a provider side exposed serviceA and in the service implimentation invokes another remote service serviceB. The invoke code is like this SpringContainer.getContext().getBean("ref"); > > I don't understand why `SpringContainer.getContext().getBean("ref");` will throw NPE, by the time `contextRefreshedEvent` is send, the reference of ServiceB should be ready in ApplicationContext for use. > > `context.start()` should only be responsible for those beans that have implemented Lifecycle, as the javadoc showed: > > ```java > /** > * Start all registered beans that implement {@link Lifecycle} and are not > * already running. Any bean that implements {@link SmartLifecycle} will be > * started within its 'phase', and all phases will be ordered from lowest to > * highest value. All beans that do not implement {@link SmartLifecycle} will be > * started in the default phase 0. A bean declared as a dependency of another bean > * will be started before the dependent bean regardless of the declared phase. > */ > @Override > public void start() { > startBeans(false); > this.running = true; > } > ``` 因为服务暴露是在Spring的ContextRefresh阶段，服务暴露后，就会有交易进来。这个阶段SpringContainer中的XMLClasspathApplicationContext对象还在启动中，并没有赋值成功，但是服务已经暴露了，如果交易量大的情况下，服务实现类里面通过SpringContainer.getContext().getBean("ref");去获取另外一个服务的引用，肯定会报NPE的，不知道说清楚了没。
@463535160 你好，可以了解一下docker swarm集群模式下的overlay跨主机网络模型，在跨主机网络模型下，容器之间是可以通信的，意味着即使dubbo将docker容器的ip地址注册到zookeeper，只要在同一个跨主机网段下，是可以做到通信的。

@463535160 同样地，在k8s下集群模式下每个容器都有一个pod ip，在k8s集群模式下每个pod同样可以互相通信。
也就是说，如果你简单地用docker，那么你就要额外地配置，将宿主机作为注册ip地址，如果你用了一些集群方案，比如k8s、swarm等，这些工具已经帮你想好解决方案了。
let's close it for now.

I am thinking of the possibility of making each remote call async: `invocation.setAttachment(Constants.ASYNC_KEY, Boolean.TRUE.toString());`

then, `invoker.invoke()` itself will return a Future like async result directly, if this result has started to count timeout from the moment its request data was sent to the remote server, we will not need to calculate timeout by ourself like what we do now for each Future.

首先，从功能上来说，2.7.0对低版本2.6 2.5是完全兼容的，也就是说版本之间可以互相发现与调用，老版本可以逐步升级为2.7.0版本实现平滑升级。

包修改可能会带来一些改造成本，尤其是你有自定义SPI扩展的情况下，但这个问题是显示的在开发阶段完成的，不会带来运行期升级问题。

2.7.0中的新功能或新的使用方式，你可以逐步按需启用，也就是说在升级Dubbo到2.7.0的依赖后，理论上可以继续以2.6的方式使用。
